name: The Adoration of the Magi
description: The Adoration of the Magi; Guillaume Courtois (French, 1628 - 1679); about 1665; Red chalk heightened with white (partly oxidized), the outlines indented with the stylus; 29.8 x 19.7 cm (11 3/4 x 7 3/4 in.); 95.GB.41; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: The Adoration of the Magi
medium: Red chalk heightened with white (partly oxidized), the outlines indented with the stylus
